1ed375d7-288d-48b3-adda-aa8de18ba7b4: A stalwart defender is proficient with all simple and {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}martial weapons{/g} and with all armor (heavy, light, and medium) and shields (including tower shields).
3c77e273-90c2-4e27-8540-374a846d5559: A stalwart defender receives a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} that starts at +1 on the 1st level. It improves to +2 at 4th level, to +3 at 7th level, and reaches the maximum of +4 at 10th level.
cfeeba22-3958-4057-915c-8bc459c5352b: As a stalwart defender gains levels, he augments his defensive stance. Starting at 2nd level, the stalwart defender gains a defensive power. He gains another defensive power for every two levels of stalwart defender attained after 2nd level. The stalwart defender gains the benefits of defensive powers only while in a defensive stance, and some of these powers require him to take an {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} first. Unless otherwise noted, he cannot select an individual power more than once.
24a0ae35-c51e-4233-b5be-fab45da05ce6: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the stalwart defender {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + his {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. For every two levels the stalwart defender has attained above 2nd, this healing increases by 1d8, to a maximum of 5d8 at 10th level. This power can be used only once per day and only while in a defensive stance.
80f41b4d-e1b7-441a-aca7-412adbb1b74f: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the stalwart defender {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + his {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. For every two levels the stalwart defender has attained above 2nd, this healing increases by 1d8, to a maximum of 5d8 at 10th level. This power can be used only once per day and only while in a defensive stance.
bcc47e8d-9063-42e9-8fea-7cc81bb39f26:
At 1st level, a stalwart defender can enter a defensive stance, a position of readiness and trance-like determination. A stalwart defender can maintain this stance for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to 4 + his {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. At each level after 1st, he can maintain the stance for 2 additional rounds per day. Temporary increases to Constitution, such as those gained from the defensive stance and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} like {g|SpellsBearsEndurance}bear's endurance{/g}, do not increase the total number of rounds that the stalwart defender can maintain a defensive stance per day. The stalwart defender can enter a defensive stance as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. The total number of rounds of defensive stance per day is renewed after {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}resting{/g} for 8 hours, although these hours do not need to be consecutive. While in a defensive stance, a stalwart defender gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, thrown weapon damage rolls, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throws{/g}. In addition, he gains a +2 dodge bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} and 2 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}. While in a defensive stance, a stalwart defender cannot willingly move from his current position through any means.
The stalwart defender can end his defensive stance as a free {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}; after ending the stance, he is {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} for a number of rounds equal to 2 times the number of rounds spent in the stance. A stalwart defender cannot enter a new defensive stance while fatigued or {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g} but can otherwise enter a stance multiple times during a single encounter or combat. If a stalwart defender falls {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}, his defensive stance immediately ends, placing him in peril of death. A defensive stance requires a level of emotional calm, and it may not be maintained by a character in a rage (such as from the rage class feature or the {g|SpellsRage}rage{/g} spell).
8fbd7b61-2d29-4635-aca5-5c143410080e: At 5th level, a stalwart defender gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/—. At 7th level, this DR increases to 3/—, and at 10th level, it increases to 5/—. This DR stacks with other sources of damage reduction, but only when the stalwart defender is wearing armor.
31378019-2368-4a27-9f76-228553e72db6: Stalwart defenders are masters of melee combat, striving to prove that the best offense is a good defense. Stalwart defenders are normally found on the front lines of battle, holding a position to cover their allies, leaping into breaches of opposing formations and holding them open for others, and guarding more vulnerable allies by acting as mobile fortifications, stable points in the ever-changing chaos of battle.
a53b254e-e8ba-4910-8c40-a2fdb3499bae: The stalwart defender is immune to the {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} and {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} conditions.
df1e0280-695f-4671-a7cc-348e37182c84: The stalwart defender may enter a defensive stance even if {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}. While maintaining a defensive stance after using this ability, he is immune to the fatigued condition.
ae59a8df-1b28-444b-a351-7693bccdc3b0: The stalwart defender's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} from this class increases by 1/—. This increase is always active while the stalwart defender is in a defensive stance. He can select this power up to two times. Its effects stack. The stalwart defender must be at least 6th level before selecting this defensive power.
285673fd-5c6b-4b2a-9598-f8f8a52eac73: While in a defensive stance, a stalwart defender gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, thrown weapon damage rolls, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throws{/g}. In addition, she gains a +2 dodge bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} and 2 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}.
e5bbfa5f-b227-46b3-a03e-5fb1ddd0ad68: While in a defensive stance, the stalwart defender is immune to the {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g} and {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g} conditions. He must be at least 4th level before selecting this power.
bdba0ff6-8d05-41a9-b11c-2017615f2b23: While in a defensive stance, the stalwart defender may make an extra slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} (even if he doesn't normally have a slam attack). If used as part of a full attack, the extra attack is made at the stalwart defender's full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} –5. The smash deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (if the stalwart defender is {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Medium{/g}, or 1d3 if he is Small) plus half the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier.
